topic.title: DICOM Object Catalog Section - conformance rules

lines.i: DICOM Object Catalog lists all referenced objects and their parent Series and Studies, plus other DICOM attributes required for retrieving the objects. DICOM Object Catalog sections are not intended for viewing and contain empty section text.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8525, CONF:10454 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.1.1"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15456)/@code="121181" Dicom Object Catalog (CodeSystem: 1.2.840.10008.2.16.4 DCM) (CONF:15457)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:8530, CONF:15458)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.6)
A DICOM Object Catalog SHALL be present if the document contains references to DICOM Images. If present, it SHALL be the first section in the document. (CONF:8527)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15456)/@code="121181" Dicom Object Catalog (CodeSystem: 1.2.840.10008.2.16.4 DCM) (CONF:15457)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:8530, CONF:15458)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.6)
A DICOM Object Catalog SHALL be present if the document contains references to DICOM Images. If present, it SHALL be the first section in the document. (CONF:8527)
